options: NSAIDs/colchicine برای uncomplicated pericarditis است نه tamponade.
درست: Hemodynamically significant tamponade (hypotension + JVD) = pericardiocentesis فوری ضروری است.
Conservative waiting contraindicated در hemodynamic compromise.
Surgery definitive لکن اول drainage کند.
points: Cardiac tamponade: hypotension + elevated JVP + muffled heart sounds + pulsus paradoxus.
RV diastolic collapse on echo = sign of raised intrapericardial pressure.
Pericardiocentesis: drainage of fluid → hemodynamic improvement فوری.
Post-drainage: maintain IV fluids + identify etiology (malignancy، TB، viral، idiopathic).

questions.question: مردی 67 ساله با سرطان ریه فشردگی قلب (cardiac tamponade) ارائه شده است. علایم: dyspnea، hypotension (SBP 85 mmHg)، JVD، و pulsus paradoxus. Echo: effusion بزرگ با RV diastolic collapse. کدام اولویت اول است؟

options: درست: Acute pericarditis non-tamponade = NSAID + colchicine. Colchicine reduce recurrence 50%.
Steroids reserved برای recurrent/constrictive cases یا immunosuppressed.
Pericardiocentesis unnecessary برای small effusion without tamponade.
Empiric antibiotics not standard مگر clinical suspicion bacterial.
points: Acute pericarditis diagnosis: pleuritic chest pain + pericardial friction rub + ST elevation diffuse (concave).
Colchicine 0.5 mg BID × 3 months reduce recurrence pericarditis.
NSAIDs: indomethacin 50 mg TID یا ibuprofen 800 mg TID × 2 weeks.
Bed rest initial; avoid strenuous activity برای prevent myocarditis exacerbation.

questions.question: زن 35 ساله با acute pericarditis (ECG با ST elevation diffuse + PR depression) و small pericardial effusion ارائه شده است. بدون tamponade. کدام management مناسب است؟

options: Tamponade resolved اگر intrapericardial pressure normalize; لکن RA still elevated = constriction.
درست: Effusive-constrictive = pericardial effusion + constriction physiology. Dip-plateau hemodynamics persist post-drainage.
Cor pulmonale history না; RV primary failure نیست.
Restrictive CMP similar hemodynamics لکن normal pericardium.
points: Effusive-constrictive pericarditis: combination of fluid + constricted pericardium.
Post-pericardiocentesis: dip-plateau (Kussmaul sign) persist = constriction manifest.
History radiation therapy = risk effusive-constrictive pericarditis.
Management: consider pericardiectomy اگر symptoms persist (surgery improves 80% cases).

questions.question: مردی 72 ساله با history of radiation therapy برای lymphoma دارای dyspnea exertional و edema. Echo: normal LVEF، large pericardial effusion. Catheterization: RA pressure elevated (15 cmH2O)، prominent y descent، equalized diastolic pressures. Post-pericardiocentesis: RA pressure NOT بالا نمی‌رود. کدام تشخیص؟

options: درست: Constrictive pericarditis classic: dip-plateau hemodynamics + equalized filling pressures + septal bounce على echo.
Restrictive CMP: similar pattern لکن RV pressure > LV pressure بیشتر (discordance with inspiration ممکن).
DCM: systolic function abnormal; اینجا normal.
Cor pulmonale: RV dominant; اینجا bilateral involvement.
points: Constrictive pericarditis: fibrous pericardium restrict ventricular filling.
Hallmark: equalized diastolic pressures + restrictive filling pattern + prominent y descent.
TB = major cause constrictive pericarditis in developing countries.
Treatment: pericardiectomy (mortality 1-10% contemporary series). Surgery improve 80-90% symptomatic cases.

questions.question: مردی 58 ساله with history tuberculosis (old) ارائه شده است with dyspnea progressive، edema، ascites. Echo: normal systolic function، prominent septal bounce. Catheterization: equalized diastolic pressures (RVDP = LVEDP = 20)، steep x و y descents، dip-plateau pattern. کدام diagnosis؟

options: درست: Lupus pericarditis → corticosteroids first-line (prednisolone 0.5-1 mg/kg/day). NSAIDs adjunctive.
Colchicine not standard برای lupus serositis.
Cyclophosphamide reserved for severe/refractory lupus nephritis یا CNS involvement.
points: SLE pericarditis: typically resolves with corticosteroids + NSAIDs.
ANA + complement low characteristic lupus; serology support diagnosis.
Monitor for lupus nephritis (urinalysis); may need additional immunosuppression.
ECG diffuse ST elevation with PR depression = pericarditis pattern (not STE-ACS).

questions.reference: ESC Pericarditis Guidelines; Harrison Ch 356 SLE
questions.question: زن 45 ساله acute pericarditis + pleurisy + arthralgia + malar rash. Labs: ANA positive، complement low. ECG: diffuse ST elevation. Diagnosis: lupus pericarditis. کدام treatment priority?

options: NSAIDs + colchicine are appropriate first-line therapy
Absence of ST elevation exclude pericarditis diagnosis
Small effusion NOT contraindication to conservative management
ST elevation present در 60% pericarditis; absence NOT exclude diagnosis.
درست: ST elevation نیست pathognomonic; absent ST NOT rule out pericarditis.
Troponin negative fairly common in pure pericarditis (inflammatory).
Small effusion + hemodynamic stability = conservative approach safe.
points: Pericarditis diagnosis: 2/4 criteria = pleuritic pain، friction rub، ST elevation (ECG)، pericardial effusion (echo).
ST elevation appear 1-2 weeks; PR depression more specific early.
Troponin rise = myopericarditis involvement (myocardial injury).
Echocardiography utility: characterize effusion (size، location)، exclude other causes (tamponade، cardiac masses).

questions.question: مردی 52 ساله pleuritic chest pain + pericardial friction rub. ECG: normal (نه ST elevation). CXR: cardiac silhouette normal. Echo: minimal pericardial effusion (< 1 cm). Labs: troponin negative. Clinical diagnosis: acute pericarditis. کدام نادرست است?

options: Medical therapy temporary; definitive cure NOT possible.
درست: Pericardiectomy surgical curative برای constrictive pericarditis. Contemporary mortality < 1-5%.
Renal failure not primary problem; ascites من pericardial constriction.
points: Constrictive pericarditis post-radiation: calcified pericardium common.
Pericardiectomy goal: relieve pericardial constraint → hemodynamic normalization.
Success rate: 80-90% patients report symptom improvement. NYHA class improve.
Post-pericardiectomy complications: transient increase CO (pericardial constraint released); avoid aggressive diuretics initially.

questions.question: مردی 64 ساله with mantle field radiation (lymphoma) 10 years ago. Present: dyspnea، lower extremity edema، ascites. Echo: normal LVEF، dense calcium rim around heart. No coronary disease. Hemodynamics: dip-and-plateau RV/LV pressures. Best management?

options: Pericardial effusion always present in acute pericarditis
Colchicine 0.5 mg BID × 3 months reduce recurrence.
درست: Effusion NOT always present; can have pericarditis (pain + friction rub + ECG changes) بدون effusion.
points: Idiopathic pericarditis: likely viral (enterovirus، adenovirus) اگر no identifiable cause.
Pericardial effusion present in 70% cases؛ absence NOT exclude diagnosis.
Small effusion → large effusion possible progression; serial echos for monitoring.
Colchicine primarily prevent recurrent episodes; less effective acute phase.

questions.question: زن 28 ساله acute pericarditis (pleuritic pain + friction rub). Etiology workup: negative viral serologies، negative tuberculin test، negative ANA. Self-limited course expected. کدام statement درباره idiopathic pericarditis درست نیست؟

options: MI possible لکن Troponin/ECG typically abnormal; syndrome presentation less acute.
درست: Dressler syndrome (post-cardiac injury) = fever + pericarditis + effusion 2-3 weeks post-surgery.
Bacterial pericarditis rare post-surgical اگر prophylactic antibiotics دریافت شد.
PE possible لکن pericarditis component atypical.
points: Dressler syndrome: autoimmune-mediated post-cardiac surgery/MI pericarditis.
Features: pleuritic pain، fever، pericardial/pleural effusion، elevated ESR/CRP.
Management: NSAIDs + colchicine similar acute pericarditis. Corticosteroids اگر resistant.
Self-limited usually؛ prognosis excellent.

questions.question: مردی 40 ساله post-cardiac surgery (CABG 2 weeks ago) دارای chest pain pleuritic، fever. Echo: pericardial effusion. کدام diagnosis probable?

options: درست: TB pericarditis → exudative + elevated ADA (> 20 U/L suggestive TB).
Malignancy exudative لکن cytology검색; ADA typical normal.
points: TB pericarditis: most common cause constrictive pericarditis globally.
Pericardial fluid ADA > 10 U/L suggestive TB (sensitivity 80-85%).
Definitive diagnosis: pericardial biopsy (granuloma) یا fluid culture/PCR.
Management TB pericarditis: anti-TB drugs × 6 months + adjunctive corticosteroids (improve outcomes).

questions.question: مردی 56 ساله pericarditis + large effusion (4 cm). Fluid analysis: exudate (LDH > 2× serum، protein > 3.0 g/dL)، ADA = 25 U/L. کدام etiology most likely?
